title: [Large-scale] Technology Acceptance and Training Program Participation: Mobile Microlearning-Based Leadership Competency Strengthening

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage proficiency and administrative work experience
context.additional_context: Conducts smartphone-based learning in PC-unavailable environments, emphasizing practical application through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core elements of the Unified Theory of Acceptance and Use of Technology (UTAUT)—performance expectancy, effort expectancy, social influence—in mobile environments and connect them to training program participation.
Learners can explain the impact of training responses (satisfaction, perceived usefulness) on technology usage intentions through case analysis.
Learners can design and execute team-based projects in resource-constrained technological environments, specifying technology utilization strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
